SignIn.title: Welcome Back
SignIn.description: Sign in to continue tracking your habits and achieving your goals.
SignIn.successMessage: Welcome back! You have successfully signed in.

SignUp.title: Create Your Account
SignUp.description: Join us today and start building better habits for a healthier, more productive you.
SignUp.successMessage: Account created successfully! Please check your email to verify your account.

ForgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
ForgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
ForgotPassword.successMessage: Password reset link sent to your email!

ResetPassword.title: Reset Your Password
ResetPassword.description: Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link to get back into your account.
ResetPassword.successMessage: Your password has been reset successfully!

expired_link.title: Expired Link
expired_link.description: Your reset link has expired. Please request a new one.

already_used.title: Link Already Used
already_used.description: This link has already been used. Try requesting a new reset link.

exchange_failed.title: Session Exchange Failed
exchange_failed.description: Something went wrong while verifying your session. Please try again.

verification_failed.title: Verification Failed
verification_failed.description: We could not verify your request. Double-check your link.

invalid_or_missing_token.title: Invalid or Missing Token
invalid_or_missing_token.description: The token is missing or invalid. Please try again.

invalid_or_missing_code.title: Invalid or Missing Code
invalid_or_missing_code.description: The code is missing or invalid. Please try again.

NotFound.title: Page Not Found
NotFound.description: The authentication page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

Error.title: Something went wrong
Error.description: We encountered an error while loading the authentication page. Please try again.
